programme.title: Hammer House Of Horror
programme.desc: A man sees the number nine everywhere and is convinced the forces of evil are at work.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: In Studio 666, the legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album. Once in the house, Dave Grohl finds himself grappling with supernatural forces that threaten both the completion of the album and the lives of the band.

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu leads to the rediscovery of his faith.

programme.title: Thriller
programme.desc: After an actress who plays a nun in a TV series meets a strange fan, several cast members meet with fatal or near-fatal accidents.

programme.title: MST3K: Pod People
programme.desc: An alien slaughters the poachers and campers it encounters in the woods, while a boy befriends its offspring.

programme.title: MST3K: Radar Men From The Moon
programme.desc: The intrepid Commander Cody takes on malicious moon men in this epic 1952 serial.

programme.title: MST3K: The Hellcats
programme.desc: Joel and the 'bots attempt to puzzle out what's going on in the unintelligible biker film, The Hellcats (1968)

programme.title: MST3K: The Horror Of Party Beach
programme.desc: Mike and the 'bots watch The Horror of Party Beach (1964).

programme.title: MST3K: Tormented
programme.desc: A jazz pianist is haunted by his dead ex-lover's crawling hand and floating head.

programme.title: Rifftrax: Hilbillys In A Haunted House
programme.desc: RiffTrax bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 60's non-scary horror classic!
